name: CheckersYT
description:
Multi player Checkers game in Unity3d   Without using unit, photon or any third-party libraries just with raw C#  TCB sock it

 

This is the best way because it can run in any system without any problems,

 

let’s get start with real human’s player and enjoy the conversation in chat wile playing,   

 

this game takes a lot of hard working and time in development if you like this game pleas support this creation by the way you prefer to help me make a lot of games like this and  free for any one…
